name: ai-mmo-root
description: Text-based MMO RPG with AI-generated worlds

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter gateway dev" "pnpm --filter game-service dev" "pnpm --filter worldgen-service dev" "pnpm --filter interpreter-service dev" "pnpm --filter narrator-service dev" "pnpm --filter inventory-service dev" "pnpm --filter market-service dev" "pnpm --filter ws-notifier dev" "pnpm --filter web dev"
scripts.dev:db:migrate: cd infra && pnpm prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:db:seed: cd infra && pnpm prisma db seed
scripts.dev:db:reset: cd infra && pnpm prisma migrate reset
